name: Spirit Hunt
description:
A new Hunter has begun his journey to become the world's greatest Spirit Hunter. Help him get qualified to be a Spirit Hunter by guiding him through the dangerous forest filled with spirits.

Controls :

  • A/D       - Player Movement
  • Space    - Player Jump
  • Mouse  - Fire Weapon
  • Enter/Right Click - Interact 
  • Ctrl + F - Toggle Full-screen

Game Engine used -GameMaker Studio 2

Assets (Music and Some Art):

  1. Music - Kevin Macleod
  2. Art - 0x72. ansimuz and Me :)
